languages.text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} effect, all their allies gain +5% to {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} for every attack they have made since the start of this effect.
languages.original_text: Когда на командира Астра Милитарум действует эффект Эффективной муштры, все его союзники получают +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} за каждую атаку, которую они совершают с момента активации эффекта.

traits.locale_text: While the Astra Militarum Commander is under the Combined Arms effect, all their allies gain +5% to Rate of Fire for every attack they have made since the beginning of this effect.

languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, all their allies gain +5% to {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} for every attack they have made since the start of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Когда на командира Астра Милитарум действует способность Совместные учения, все его союзники получают +5% к скорострельности за каждую атаку, которую они совершают с момента активации способности.
Когда на командира Астра Милитарум действует способность Совместные учения, все его союзники получают +5% к скорострельности за каждую атаку, которую они совершают с момента активации способности.

languages.text: Solange der Astra Militarum-Commander unter dem Effekt {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimentstaktiken{/g} steht, erhalten alle seine Verbündeten +5 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} für jeden Angriff, den sie seit Beginn dieses Effekts ausgeführt haben.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} effect, all their allies gain +5% to {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} for every attack they have made since the start of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Solange der Astra Militarum-Commander unter dem Effekt Verbundene Waffen steht, erhalten alle seine Verbündeten +5% auf {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuerrate{/g} für jeden Angriff, den sie seit Beginn dieses Effekts ausgeführt haben.

languages.text: Tant que le commandant de l'Astra Militarum est sous l'effet d'{g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Armes combinées{/g}, tous ses alliés reçoivent un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de +5 % par attaque lancée dès l'application de cet effet.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} effect, all their allies gain +5% to {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} for every attack they have made since the start of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Tant que le commandant de l'Astra Militarum est sous l'effet d'Armes combinées, tous ses alliés reçoivent un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de +5 % par attaque lancée dès l'application de cet effet.

languages.text: 当星界军指挥官受{g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}军团战术{/g}效果影响时，指挥官的所有盟友每次攻击之后，都会额外获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}加成。
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} effect, all their allies gain +5% to {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} for every attack they have made since the start of this effect.

traits.locale_text: 当星界军指挥官受联合突击效果影响时，指挥官的所有盟友每次攻击之后，都会额外获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}加成。

languages.text: Cuando el comandante del Astra Militarum se beneficia de los efectos de {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Tácticas de regimiento{/g}, todos los aliados ganan un +5 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} por cada ataque que han lanzado desde que ha empezado el efecto.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} effect, all their allies gain +5% to {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} for every attack they have made since the start of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el comandante del Astra Militarum se beneficia de los efectos de Arsenal combinado, todos los aliados ganan un +5 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} por cada ataque que han lanzado desde que ha empezado el efecto.

languages.text: 帝国防衛軍司令が連隊戦術効果を受けている時、そのすべての味方はこの効果開始以降に行った攻撃1回につき、{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}バースト速度{/g}が+5%される。
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, all their allies gain +5% to {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} for every attack they have made since the start of this effect.

traits.locale_text: 帝国防衛軍司令が連携軍隊効果を受けている時、そのすべての味方はこの効果開始以降に行った攻撃1回につき、{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}連射速度{/g}が+5%される。

languages.text: Astra Militarum komutanı {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Alay Taktikleri{/g} etkisi altındayken tüm dost birimleri, bu etkinin başlangıcından itibaren yaptıkları her saldırı için +%5 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızı{/g} kazanırlar.
languages.original_text: While the Astra Militarum commander is under the {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} effect, all their allies gain +5% to {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} for every attack they have made since the start of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Astra Militarum komutanı Alay Taktikleri etkisi altındayken tüm dost birimleri, bu etkinin başlangıcından itibaren yaptıkları her saldırı için +%5 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızı{/g} kazanırlar.
